amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase HUD Assisted Housing funding for section 8 rental certificates or vouchers by $174 million and decrease NASA Human Space Flight funding for the space station by $174 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 26 as printed in the Congressional Record to increase by $174 million (to $5.5 billion) the appropriation for HUD assisted housing programs. This increase would be used to fund about 30,000 incremental Section 8 rental assistance contracts for low income families. The offset for the increase would come from a $174 million reduction in funds for the space station. station.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kennedy (MA) amendment (A003) Failed by voice vote.
